Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Utility
  • public final class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Utility includes shared utility methods to avoid cluttering in other classes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Utility()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int convertAngle​(double angle)
      Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
      static int convertDistance​(double distance)
      Converts input distance traveled by each wheel to the rotation angle of the robot.
      static boolean motorsAreStopped()
      Returns whether the motors are stopped.
      static void moveStraight​(int motorSpeed)
      Moves the robot straight at a given speed.
      static void moveStraightFor​(double distance, int motorSpeed)
      Moves the robot straight for an input distance.
      static void moveStraightForWithoutWaiting​(double distance, int motorSpeed)
      Moves the robot straight for an input distance, but does not wait for move to complete.
      static void resetTacho()
      Resets the tachometer count of both motors.
      static void sleepFor​(long duration)
      Pauses a thread for an input duration.
      static void stopMotors()
      Stops both motors.
      static void turnBy​(double angle, int motorSpeed)
      Turns the robot by an input angle.
      static void turnByWithoutWaiting​(double angle, int motorSpeed)
      Turns the robot by an input angle, but does not wait for move to complete.

      • convertDistance

        public static int convertDistance​(double distance)
        Converts input distance traveled by each wheel to the rotation angle of the robot.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance traveled by each wheel
        Returns:
        the angle rotated by the robot

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle​(double angle)
        Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - the input angle
        Returns:
        the wheel rotations necessary to rotate the robot by the angle

      • turnBy

        public static void turnBy​(double angle,
                          int motorSpeed)
        Turns the robot by an input angle. Positive angles move the robot in the clockwise direction
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to turn
        motorSpeed - the motor speed

      • turnByWithoutWaiting

        public static void turnByWithoutWaiting​(double angle,
                                        int motorSpeed)
        Turns the robot by an input angle, but does not wait for move to complete. Positive angles move the robot in the clockwise direction
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to turn
        motorSpeed - the motor speed
